csc171.project03.model

Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc171.project03.model.Movement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AngularMovement, RectilinearMovement

    public abstract class Movement
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a movement property. Contains a direction as a set of vector components {x, y}, or contains an angular component (with assumed 0 magnitude due to how these are treated).

    • Field Summary

      The angular component of the movement.
